text: Guan Zongxiang (28 November 1922 â€“ 13 January 2023) also known as Uncle Guan was a Chinese movie actor. He played in movies of the . He is known from among others the movies Luo tuo Xiang Zi (1982), Bao shi jie zhi (1985) and Ru lai ba gua gun (1985). He won the Golden Phoenix Awards in 2005. Guan married to actress . Their son was film director Guan Hu. His daughter-in-law was actress Liang Jing. Guan died on 13 January 2022. ==References== Category:Chinese movie actors Category:1922 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Chinese centenarians Category:Place of death missing Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people
title: Guan Zongxiang
